indexPage.headline: Turning Plays into Legends
indexPage.subheadline: Make every sports moment shine with SportsBuddy.ai. Our advanced AI brings your game stories to life.
indexPage.aboutTitle: SportsBuddy.ai: Your Personal Chef for Sports Content
indexPage.aboutSubtitle: “Crafting Fresh Sports Highlights à la Carte.”
indexPage.aboutPara:
At SportsBuddy.ai, we're transforming how sports stories are brought to life. Built on award-winning research from the Harvard Visual Computing Group, we leverage cutting-edge AI to capture the most impactful moments of every game, delivering seamless and engaging experiences that amplify the excitement of sports.

Our platform is designed with a deep understanding of user needs and core values. By combining intuitive interactions with real-time visualizations, we make it easy for athletes, coaches, and content creators to craft informative, engaging, and personalized video highlights that truly resonate.
indexPage.missionPara: To Empower the next generation of sports storytelling for professionals and enthusiasts through informative, engaging, and personalized experiences.
indexPage.visionSubtitle: We Place Human at the Heart of our AI Technologies
indexPage.vision-1-Para: Enable every sports enthusiast to effortlessly share their insights through seamless integration of data, insights, and narratives.
indexPage.vision-2-Para: Transform game insights into engaging moments, revolutionizing how fans experience and appreciate sports.
indexPage.vision-3-Para: Drive innovation to elevate sports engagement using advanced computer vision, LLM, and data visualizations.

indexPage.sloganTitle: SportsBuddy.ai is a revolutionary platform designed to transform every game moment into captivating stories.
indexPage.productPara: Leveraging advanced AI technology, SportsBuddy Studio turns raw game clips into compelling stories with engaging visual and audio cues in just a few clicks. We handle the editing, so you can focus on your audience.
indexPage.productFeature-1-Para: Automatically detect players and track their movements to create interactive and engaging visual effects.
indexPage.productFeature-2-Para: Use automated annotations, subtitles, and voiceovers to showcase your insights and create compelling stories.
indexPage.productFeature-3-Para: Organize and access your highlight clips with ease using customized tags and a powerful search, all in one place.
indexPage.customerFeedback-1-Para: Highlighting specific plays effectively showcase our strengths and can boost players' confidence in their performances. Additionally, it encourages fans and donors to support our games and initiatives.
indexPage.customerFeedback-2-Para: Really love SportsBuddy! This is such an incredible idea. As a content creator who film/edits all my content, this would cut down editing time by more than 50%!!!
indexPage.customerFeedback-3-Para: Our collaboration turned out to be very effective for fan and family engagement and helped expand media coverage of the IVY league. The workflow was also very easy - it took me 2 minutes to record the voiceover.
indexPage.customerFeedback-4-Para: I appreciate that SportsBuddy aims to capture someone's story effectively. Being able to capture a person’s story can have a significant impact on potential opportunities for that player.
